page.title: 07WOKINGHAM - COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: The main{post Office}is situated in Broad Street, Wokingham. Collections here are 6am, 10am, 11am, 4.15pm, 6.30pm (the last two not on Saturday). There are no collections on Sundays or public holidays and only 3 on Good Friday, 5am, 6.15am, 7am. There are 2 deliveries daily at 6.45am to 9.30am on Monday to Saturday. Parcels are delivered from 9.45am on these days. There are no deliveries on Sundays and Bank Holidays. There are also three sub{Post Offices}. There are 24 public {telephones} throughout the area concentrated at the station and the main{Post Office}. There are two{local newspapers}, the Wokingham Times and News. There is also a{local radio station } called 210 which suoplies reports of local news items and traffic conditions.
